entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 8 May 2023
